value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.11916v1", "title": "Non-vanishing of Dirichlet $L$-functions at the Central Point", "summary": "We prove that for at least $\\frac{7}{19}$ of the primitive Dirichlet\ncharacters $\\chi$ with large general modulus, the central value\n$L(\\frac12,\\chi)$ is non-vanishing.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-16T09:54:28Z"}
